pkgmetadata.longdescription: Information Consistency-Based Measures for Spatial Stratified Heterogeneity // Spatial stratified heterogeneity (SSH) denotes the coexistence of within-strata homogeneity and between-strata heterogeneity. Information consistency-based methods provide a rigorous approach to quantify SSH and evaluate its role in spatial processes, grounded in principles of geographical stratification and information theory (Bai, H. et al. (2023) doi:10.1080/24694452.2023.2223700; Wang, J. et al. (2024) doi:10.1080/24694452.2023.2289982).
